headline.main: BEVIN LABOR DRAFT ASSAILED BY M.P.'S; British Minister Is Accused of Being Too Tender With the Employers and Workers HE DEFENDS HIS SYSTEM Declares He Seeks Willing Service, Not a Nation of Industrial Slaves

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 2 -- Labor Minister Ernest Bevin was attacked in the House of Commons today on grounds that he was unduly tender to employers and at the same time was gingerly handling unwilling workers. He defended himself, asserting that conditions that had been allowed to develop for many years could not be changed overnight.
abstract: Gt Brit: Min Bevin defends labor service, Commons
